body.description: Skintimate Raspberry Rain Women's Shave Gel does more than just smell great - 6 moisturizers help replenish your skin's natural moisture and deliver unbeatable razor protection for a comfortable, more touchable shave.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Skintimate Raspberry Rain Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Coconut Delight Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Skin Therapy Dry Skin Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Vanilla Sugar Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Skin Therapy Sensitive Skin Moisturizing Shave Gel Shave Gel Benefits Formulated with six moisturizers, Vitamin E and olive butter, this foaming shave gel with a luscious scent creates a rich, luxurious lather that aids razor glide for a close, comfortable shave and smooth, show-stopping legs. A hydrating formula with coconut water + six moisturizers, including Vitamin E and olive butter to help replenish and protect the skin with a coconut and exotic plumeria petal fragrance with rich moisturizers for smooth, irresistibly touchable skin Replenish your skin's natural moisture with Skintimate Dry Skin Shave Gel and stop dreading the shave. The lotion-like gel foams into a rich protective lather for a close, comfortable shave and smooth, healthy-looking skin Formulated with six hydrating moisturizers, including shea butter and Vitamin E, with the rich, sweet scent of Vanilla and Sugar Skintimate Sensitive Skin Shave Gel is formulated with extra conditioners and lubricants like aloe and Vitamin E to moisturize and soften skin, and protect against painful nicks and irritation. It even helps replenish your skin’s natural moisture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the whole family
reviews.reviewText: I have a house hold of teen girls and myself and this product is the best! Smells good and foams up super nice. Makes shaving a little more fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT! only slightly cheaper than KingSoopers prices
reviews.reviewText: Totally worth the purchase. The cream is smooth foam and not runny. Keeps your skin feeling smooth after the shave!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Every single bottle defective
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know what exactly the issue is but not one bottle is operational. You press on the button and nothing comes out, maybe a few suds. But the gel doesn’t come out. Not worth my time to return it so it’s just a waste of money. Do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite shaving gel
reviews.reviewText: The best shaving gel that works for me . I'm able to get a close shave .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I never usually use shaving cream when I shave; mostly because I never liked how they smelled and how they made my legs feel afterwards (soapy and sticky).I read about this product online (not the most reliable source, I know) but I decided to take a leap of faith... I was pleasantly surprised at how moisturized my legs were afterwards (which was the main reason why I purchased this product)I am very happy with this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars when you epilate it does not mistreat the skin
reviews.reviewText: when you epilate with a razor blade it does not mistreat the skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Good product. Have always used this brand shaving gel. Would recommend the brand to other buyers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of Money
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this multipack through subscribe and save and 4 out of the 6 cans didn’t even work! Of course by the time I figured this out the return window was over. Don’t purchase these, the quality isn’t there. From now on I will be purchasing singles from the store.
